projectCategory.name: Client

fields.description:
h3. Description 
LaunchMobileWebProjectEmulator - Launch the projects in the emulator's browser

h3. Steps to reproduce issue 
1. Select the project in the Project Explorer or App Explorer 
2. Click the "run" button in the header, choosing the "emulator" option

h3. Expected result 
A dialog stating "Mobile web is not yet supported by this template" is currently presented

Test run: http://appcelerator.testlodge.com/projects/1317/test_runs/8370#executed_case_161893
